---
title: Getting R Help
---

To get help help for a particular function, type ? and then the function name:

```
?mean

```

General help:
* [Cookbook for R](http://www.cookbook-r.com/)
* Google (It actually knows what "R" is now)
* Stackoverflow.com (use the `[r]` tag)
* Search the r-help mailing list
* Each other! (Talk it out)

ggplot2:
* http://docs.ggplot2.org/current/
